languages.text: Сам же Лорд-инквизитор погрузился в изыскания более таинственные и опасные — заключив в оковы одного древнего зверя, он жаждал повторить свой успех. Никакая защита Империума не могла считаться достаточной, пока все его враги не повергнуты.

The Lord Inquisitor delved deeper and deeper into dangerous and obscure fields of study. Having succeeded in shackling one ancient beast, he now wanted to repeat his success. The Imperium would never be safe while its enemies yet lived.
languages.original_text: Сам же Лорд-инквизитор погрузился в изыскания более таинственные и опасные — заключив в оковы одного древнего зверя, он жаждал повторить свой успех. Никакая защита Империума не могла считаться достаточной, пока все его враги не повергнуты.

traits.locale_text: The Lord Inquisitor himself immersed himself in more dangerous and obscure studies. He once shackled an ancient beast, and now he wanted to repeat his success. No protection would be enough for Imperium until all of its enemies have fallen.

The Lord Inquisitor himself immersed himself in more dangerous and obscure studies. He once shackled an ancient beast, and now he wanted to repeat his success. No protection would be enough for Imperium until all of its enemies have fallen.

The Lord Inquisitor delved deeper and deeper into dangerous and obscure fields of study. Managing to once shackle an ancient beast, he now wanted to repeat his success. The Imperium would never be safe while its enemies yet lived.

The Lord Inquisitor delved deeper and deeper into dangerous and obscure fields of study. Managing to once shackle an ancient beast, he now wanted to repeat his success. The Imperium would never be safe while its enemies yet lived.

The Lord Inquisitor delved deeper and deeper into dangerous and obscure fields of study. Having succeeded in shackling one ancient beast, he now wanted to repeat his success. The Imperium would never be safe while its enemies yet lived.

The Lord Inquisitor delved deeper and deeper into dangerous and obscure fields of study. Having succeeded in shackling one ancient beast, he now wanted to repeat his success. The Imperium would never be safe while its enemies yet lived.

languages.text: 大审判官在危险、晦涩的研究领域里钻研得越来越深。他曾成功束缚了一头古老的野兽，而现在，他想再次重现这样的成功。只要帝国之敌仍然存在，帝国就永无安宁之日。
languages.original_text: The Lord Inquisitor delved deeper and deeper into dangerous and obscure fields of study. Having succeeded in shackling one ancient beast, he now wanted to repeat his success. The Imperium would never be safe while its enemies yet lived.

traits.locale_text: 审判长在危险、晦涩的研究领域里钻研得越来越深。他曾成功束缚了一头古老的野兽，而现在，他想再次重现这样的成功。只要帝国之敌仍然存在，帝国就永无安宁之日。

languages.text: Der Großinquisitor tauchte tiefer und tiefer in gefährliche und obskure Studienbereiche ein. Es war ihm schon einmal gelungen, ein uraltes Monster in Fesseln zu legen, diesen Erfolg wollte er nun wiederholen. Das Imperium würde nie wieder sicher sein, so lange seine Feinde noch lebten.
languages.original_text: The Lord Inquisitor delved deeper and deeper into dangerous and obscure fields of study. Having succeeded in shackling one ancient beast, he now wanted to repeat his success. The Imperium would never be safe while its enemies yet lived.

traits.locale_text: Der Großinquisitor tauchte tiefer und tiefer in gefährliche und obskure Studienbereiche ein. Es war ihm einmal gelungen, ein uraltes Monster in Fesseln zu legen, diesen Erfolg wollte er nun wiederholen. Das Imperium würde nie wieder sicher sein, so lange seine Feinde noch lebten.

languages.text: Le seigneur inquisiteur se plongea dans l'étude de sujets de plus en plus dangereux et obscurs. Après avoir réussi à asservir une bête ancienne, il comptait bien réitérer ce haut fait. L'Imperium ne serait jamais en sécurité tant que ses ennemis resteraient en vie.
languages.original_text: The Lord Inquisitor delved deeper and deeper into dangerous and obscure fields of study. Having succeeded in shackling one ancient beast, he now wanted to repeat his success. The Imperium would never be safe while its enemies yet lived.

traits.locale_text: Le seigneur inquisiteur se plongea dans l’étude de sujets de plus en plus dangereux et obscurs. Après avoir asservi une bête ancienne, il comptait bien réitérer ce haut fait. L'Imperium ne serait jamais en sécurité tant que ses ennemis resteraient en vie.

languages.text: El Lord Inquisidor se adentró en estudios cada vez más secretos y peligrosos. Después de haber conseguido encadenar a una bestia ancestral, quería repetir su éxito. El Imperium nunca estaría a salvo mientras sus enemigos siguieran existiendo.
languages.original_text: The Lord Inquisitor delved deeper and deeper into dangerous and obscure fields of study. Having succeeded in shackling one ancient beast, he now wanted to repeat his success. The Imperium would never be safe while its enemies yet lived.

traits.locale_text: El Lord Inquisidor se adentró en estudios cada vez más secretos y peligrosos. Después de haber conseguido encadenar a una bestia ancestral, quería repetir su éxito. El Imperium nunca estaría a salvo mientras sus enemigos siguieran existiendo.

languages.text: ロード・インクィジターは、危険かつ不明瞭な研究分野をますます深く掘り下げていった。古代の獣を拘束することに成功した彼は、今、その成功を再び繰り返したいと考えていた。敵が生きている限り、帝国は決して安全ではないのだ。
languages.original_text: The Lord Inquisitor delved deeper and deeper into dangerous and obscure fields of study. Having succeeded in shackling one ancient beast, he now wanted to repeat his success. The Imperium would never be safe while its enemies yet lived.

traits.locale_text: ロード・インクィジターは、危険かつ不明瞭な研究分野をますます深く掘り下げていった。古代の獣を拘束することに成功した彼は、今、その成功を再び繰り返したいと考えていた。敵が生きている限り、帝国は決して安全ではないのだ。

languages.text: Lord Engizisyoncu, giderek daha tehlikeli ve daha bilinmeyen çalışma alanlarına kaydı. Kadim bir yaratığı zincire vurmayı başarmıştı ve bu başarısını tekrarlamak istiyordu. Düşmanları yaşadığı sürece İmparatorluk, asla güvende olmayacaktı.
languages.original_text: The Lord Inquisitor delved deeper and deeper into dangerous and obscure fields of study. Having succeeded in shackling one ancient beast, he now wanted to repeat his success. The Imperium would never be safe while its enemies yet lived.

traits.locale_text: Lord Engizisyoncu giderek daha tehlikeli ve daha bilinmeyen çalışma alanlarına kaydı. Kadim bir yaratığı zincire vurmayı başarmıştı ve bu başarısını tekrar etmek istiyordu. Düşmanları yaşadığı sürece İmparatorluk asla güvende olmayacaktı.
